item.title: Bin dismantled and obstructing bus stop and pavement, 28th February
item.description:
Bin dismantled and obstructing bus stop and pavement Hard to believe this is vandals or public doing this could it be the bin collectors own negligence?

item.title: Plough Way 55 dumping rubbles, 28th February
item.description:
The builders are taking over 4 -5 car places without any permit by dumping rubbles straight into the street. They’ve been illegally blocking the street for weeks but now they moved on dumping straight in the street, clogging drainage and risking damages to the cars nearby.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Plough Way, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
